Describe the bug A clear and concise description of what the bug is. ERROR: Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement cipheycore<0.4.0,>=0.3.1 (from ciphey) (from versions: 0.0.1) ERROR: No matching distribution found for cipheycore<0.4.0,>=0.3.1 (from ciphey)

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.80. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/Ciphey/Ciphey>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
I solved this problem by installing 64 bit Python. If you have a Windows operating system, of course

For Linux, this might be because of outdated PIP tool, upgrade pip3 first, then install ciphey <denchmark-code>python3 -m pip install pip --upgrade python3 -m pip install ciphey --upgrade </denchmark-code>

I'm closing this issue because you didn't fill out the full issue template so we don't know what system you're on and what versions. This error is usually caused by not using 64 bit Python and/or not using Python 3.7 or 3.8.
